ch0020_10_toya/0101_0701_01_10:
I’ve been waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Ready to battle?
ch0020_10_toya/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m ready when you are! Let’s enjoy another day
full of battles!
ch0020_10_toya/7101_0701_01_10: I think friends are really important.
ch0020_10_toya/7101_0701_02_10:
Battles and training are more fun when you’re
with friends!
ch0020_10_toya/7102_0701_01_10:
Isn’t this sygna suit nice? It makes me look like
some sort of mechanic!
ch0020_10_toya/7102_0701_02_10:
I’m still a beginner when it comes to machines, but
it’s important to look the part!
ch0020_10_toya/7103_0701_01_10:
I try to think back on each of my battles after
they’re over.
ch0020_10_toya/7103_0701_02_10:
It’s always good to reflect when you lose a battle,
but just because you won doesn’t mean your
performance was perfect.
ch0020_10_toya/7104_0701_01_10:
Did you know that Genesect is from the same
distant past as fossil Pokémon?
ch0020_10_toya/7104_0701_02_10:
Just imagining the sorts of Pokémon that existed
back then makes me excited!
ch0020_10_toya/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you have anything weighing on your
mind, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0020_10_toya/7105_0701_02_10: If you do, don’t hesitate to reach out!
ch0020_10_toya/7105_0701_03_10:
In exchange, could I reach out to you when I need
a helping hand?
ch0020_10_toya/1701_0701_01_10: There you are! I’ve been looking for you!
ch0020_10_toya/1701_0701_02_10: I want you to have this. Here you go!
ch0020_10_toya/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it comes in handy!
ch0020_10_toya/2501_0701_01_10:
The cannon on Genesect is a modification made
by Team Plasma.
ch0020_10_toya/2501_0701_02_10:
It isn’t something Genesect originally had, and it
needs regular maintenance.
ch0020_10_toya/2501_0701_03_10:
I’ve been studying how machines work so someday
I can take better care of Genesect!
ch0020_10_toya/2501_0702_01_10:
There are a few sync pairs on Pasio who are
knowledgeable about machines. Are you?
ch0020_10_toya/2501_0702_02_10: If so, I’d be grateful if you could teach me!
ch0020_10_toya/2501_0702_03_10: Studying by myself is very difficult.
ch0020_10_toya/2511_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I come across complex formulas while
I’m studying machines.
ch0020_10_toya/2511_0701_02_10: When that happens, I reach out to N for help!
ch0020_10_toya/2511_0702_01_10:
N seems to like numbers a lot. He starts talking
really fast when explaining math to me.
ch0020_10_toya/2511_0702_02_10: I can tell he’s having lots of fun!
ch0020_10_toya/2511_0702_03_10:
It makes me happy watching people get lost in
their interests!
ch0020_10_toya/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Let’s have ourselves a battle so intense,
it jolts us both awake!
ch0020_10_toya/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m going out for training after lunch. Wanna come
with me?
ch0020_10_toya/3005_0701_01_10:
Hey, great work today! Get some rest so we can
have more awesome battles tomorrow!
